dple-tracking-category: Name of the [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] where pages using [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:DynamicPageListEngine] data are listed.
dple-error-invalid-ns-index:
Error message indicating that an invalid namespace index was specified. Parameters:
* $1: specified namespace index.
dple-error-no-criteria: Error message indicating that no selection criteria were specified at all.
dple-error-too-expensive:
Error message indicating that the specified database query is not executed because it would be too expensive in terms of database load. Parameters:
* $1: numfber of joined tables that would be equivalent to the specified database query
* $2: the configured limit for this number.
dple-error-too-many-expensive-functions: DynamicPageListEngine error: Too many expensive functions used on this page.
